item.title: Video Editor for Fashion Reels - Upwork
item.description:
Hello! We are looking for a skilled video editor who can create shorts everyday for our brands. Basically Fcebook ads. (videos take max 20 min to make)

We will give raw footage and you do your magic

Some examples:
https://business.facebook.com/vivielleboutique/posts/pfbid0WoJUfc2ap9DetKheDM8Qg7kWd5TXX7qzAhgqLkkWUKk8bDqKXsDGSAKjw371e5Fjl

https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8rDfVwMjgG/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==

https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8pOAVnMXQc/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==

The hard part is not the editing as you see. Of course you need to have skills but the most important part is to make the video captivating.

You need to do researches on which fonts to use best for fashion niches, which music is now trending and "girly". You need to go on tiktok/instagram and search for fashion brands by yourself for inspiration.

Add captions with emojis and stuff, as the first video linked above

This is a BAD example: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1930vZgOueh7hVERuXHFuE6UOwGNBjCAM/view?usp=drive_link

We need the music to have ups and downs, beats , example see beat at 13s and notice how the music began low (trendy music btw):
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Qf3TRHrds17nv6dCkiKFge1mtQ8k9kb7/view?usp=drive_link

If you're ready to pop up 1 video with some variations a day (Monday to friday) and be paid 1000$/month, it would be awesome and glad to have you

Send please your porfolio. Write "fashion" at the beginning so I know you read all


Budget: $1,000
Posted On: July 01, 2024 09:13 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: France
click to apply

item.title: 20-25 sec kinetic typography dynamic loopable video - Upwork
item.description:
Hi there,

I'm looking for a editor that has experience creating short form 20-30secs dynamic edits with a mixture of clever transitions and kinetic typography.   

I'll be able to give a lose script but then looking for the creator to craft this into something that pushes the viewer to take action.

item.title: Video Editor for Facebook Ads - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Video Editor for Facebook Ads

Hourly Rate: $7 - $10

Job Type: Part-Time/Freelance

Location: Remote

Company Overview:
We are a dynamic and innovative company focused on creating engaging and effective Facebook ads. We seek a reliable, skilled, and fast video editor to join our team. If you have a keen eye for detail, a passion for storytelling, and the ability to produce high-quality videos, we want to hear from you!

Job Responsibilities:

Edit video content for Facebook ads, ensuring high quality and adherence to brand guidelines.
Collaborate with the marketing team to understand project requirements and deliver creative solutions.
Add effects, graphics, music, and sound to enhance video content.
Ensure final videos are engaging, polished, and aligned with the company's goals and objectives.
Work efficiently to meet deadlines without compromising on quality.
Requirements:

Proven experience as a video editor, with a strong portfolio of edited videos.
Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve).
Strong understanding of Facebook ad formats and best practices.
Excellent attention to detail and ability to work independently.
Good communication skills and ability to collaborate with a remote team.
Reliable internet connection and ability to work from home.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience in creating videos for social media marketing.
Knowledge of motion graphics and animation.
Application Instructions:
To apply, please submit your resume and include links to some examples of videos you have edited. These examples should showcase your editing skills, creativity, and ability to produce high-quality content.

Why Join Us:

Flexible working hours.
Opportunity to work with a creative and passionate team.
Competitive hourly rate.
Potential for long-term collaboration based on performance.
If you are a talented video editor who thrives in a fast-paced environment and is passionate about creating compelling content, we encourage you to apply!

Hourly Range: $7.00-$10.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 08:58 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Social Media Marketing, Facebook
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Social Media Marketing, Facebook
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for YouTube and Patreon Videos - Upwork
item.description:
I am seeking a skilled video editor to join my team and assist with editing my YouTube and Patreon videos. The ideal candidate will have experience in creating engaging and professional videos for online platforms. Responsibilities include reviewing raw footage, selecting the best clips, trimming and editing as needed, adding transitions and effects, ensuring the final product meets my guidelines and uploading videos to YouTube and Patreon (without publishing them). The successful candidate must be proficient in video editing. Strong attention to detail, creativity, and the ability to work collaboratively are essential skills for this role.  Being spiritual and believing in energy healing is not required but would be a huge asset.  

Hourly Range: $5.00-$15.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 08:58 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Video Intro & Outro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Video Intro & Outro
Country: Canada

item.title: Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a savvy and enthusiastic talent familiar with social media platforms, especially Instagram and TikTok. This hands-on role involves developing content strategies for various brands (cosmetics, restaurants, service providers), shooting and editing reels using mobile phones or cameras with CapCut or other editing software, and contributing to graphic design or providing creative visual insights. Familiarity with Instagram and TikTok, proficiency in video shooting and editing, and basic graphic design skills or a strong eye for visuals are preferred. Living in Southern California is preferred.

Hourly Range: $25.00-$40.00

item.title: Video Editor & Post-Production for YouTube & Meta Ads - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for experienced video editors for long-term collaboration, remote work.

You should have a good creative understanding and feeling to deliver high-quality edits, have experience in online ads, commercials, ecommerce, YouTube long-form, VSLs, and a very good feeling for animations, cutting and editing videos with focus on attention grabbing yet authentically looking videos.

For this role, candidates must be at least fluent in German, with native speakers preferred.

We work with both UGC as well as professional shootings, and create ads for YouTube, Facebook, TikTok and others for well-known ecom and D2C brands in Europe and US.

Please share examples of your best work that you personally worked on as a reference.


Posted On: July 01, 2024 08:52 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, YouTube Marketing, Video Production
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, YouTube Marketing, Video Production

item.title: Open Call: Dynamic Actors & Models for 20-30 Second Video Shorts on an Innovative Mobile App - Upwork
item.description:
Spotlight Opportunity: Seeking English-Proficient Actors & Models for Paid Short Video Content

Step into the spotlight on our innovative mobile platform, designed to be the new frontier for the stars of tomorrow. Inspired by the vibrant essence of TikTok, our app is the perfect showcase for actors and models to express their talents through a variety of engaging scripts, monologues, dialogues, and actions.

Why Join Us:
Visibility with Casting Directors: Your performances will catch the eye of not just a global audience but also casting directors looking for the next big star, offering unparalleled exposure.
Earn While You Shine: It’s more than just a stage; it’s a paid opportunity to let your talent flourish. Showcase your skills and get compensated for your contributions.

Your Role:
Create standout 20-30 second videos, using your acting or modeling skills to breathe life into our diverse content offerings.
Work alongside our team to push the boundaries of creativity, keeping our platform fresh and engaging.
Your English proficiency will be key in delivering clear, compelling performances that resonate with a wide audience.

Requirements:
Fluent in English: Excellent command of the English language is crucial for understanding scripts and conveying emotions effectively.
Tech-Savvy Creator: Must own an iOS device for seamless content creation and uploading.
Committed Performer: Demonstrate your dedication to the craft through regular, high-quality video contributions.

What You’ll Gain:
Direct exposure to industry professionals, including casting directors, looking for exceptional talent.
Financial compensation for your video contributions, valuing your artistry and effort.
A chance to be part of an artistic community that’s at the forefront of digital entertainment.

Apply Now:
Are you ready to showcase your talent to the world and make an impact? We’re seeking individuals with a strong grasp of English, ready to captivate and inspire. Send us your bio and a sample of your work to embark on this exciting journey. Let’s elevate your talent together!

Hourly Range: $10.00-$75.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 08:43 UTC
Category: Acting
Skills:Female, Male, Acting, Singing, Dancing, Lyrics, Storytelling, Film, Film Direction
Skills: Female, Male, Acting, Singing, Dancing, Lyrics, Storytelling, Film, Film Direction
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: E-commerce Video Editor and Designer - Upwork
item.description:
Buttercups Uniforms is Ireland’s premier supplier of workwear for the professional health, beauty, corporate and hospitality industries. With over 35 years’ experience, we have refined our passion for delivering high-quality uniforms at a very competitive price. Our main markets are Ireland & the UK, and we are growing globally with ambitious plans.

Looking for a designer who can create an engaging video and photos for social media, email marketing and the main banner on the website.

The work will include but is not limited to:
• Social media advertising
• Newsletter design
• Editing photos and videos from our photoshoots
• Stories / short videos for social media
• YouTube videos
• Main banner for homepage for both desktop and mobile.

The role will require you to work closely with our Digital Marketing and E-commerce manager. Ideally you will have previous E-commerce experience.

Please include any relevant previous work when applying.



Posted On: July 01, 2024 08:43 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Commercial, Digital Video, Live Action Video, Promotional Video, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Photo Slideshow, Motion Graphics, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Photoshop
Skills: Video Commercial, Digital Video, Live Action Video, Promotional Video, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Photo Slideshow, Motion Graphics, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Photoshop
Country: Ireland
click to apply

item.title: Video editor for multiple jobs - Upwork
item.description:
I have 3 projects that need editing in premiere pro. I’d like it to be in premiere pro so I can have the .ppro file to make final tweaks and adjustments myself.

Two videos are editing together clips to create a web banner for the companies website. I would need two versions of each. One with logos top/tail and corporate style music, one with just the clips.

One video is clips from a conference that need editing into a ‘highlights of the day’ with text overlays.

Full briefs will be provided for each video.

Budget: $400

item.title: Dental Video Creator for YouTube - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented individual to create engaging and informative dental videos for our YouTube channel. The ideal candidate will have experience in both dentistry and video production, with a passion for educating and entertaining our audience. The videos will cover a range of topics, including oral hygiene tips, common dental procedures, and preventative care. The successful candidate will be responsible for scriptwriting, filming, editing, and post-production.

    Skills required:
    - Strong knowledge of dentistry and oral health
    - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro)
    - Excellent storytelling and scriptwriting abilities
    - Creativity in visualizing concepts and ideas
    - Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
    - Being able to find high quality raw materials like the video's below:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wr9N1RTl_9E

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9xmAu45qSU4

This is a medium-sized project that will span over 1 to 3 months, with the possibility of extension based on performance. We are seeking an intermediate-level professional who can bring our dental videos to life with their expertise and creativity. If you are passionate about dental education and have the skills necessary to create engaging content, we would love to hear from you.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$35.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 08:41 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video, Videography, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video, Videography, Video Post-Editing
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Video ads editors - shorts / reels / tiktok - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a killer video editor for ads we're  running on Facebook, TikTok and Youtube.

All the ads have a spokeperson. Al the ads are in English.

In the video we need:
• Transitions
• Animations
• Music & sound affects

We can send about 5-10 new videos to edit a week. Let's start with 1-2 to see the quality and go from there.

We will give you the video prepared with cuts. That means you only need to add the affects, transitions, and animation.

To get an idea on how the animation should look like, please watch it in those links:

1. https://www.instagram.com/reel/CtVz6D3u6lk/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==

2. https://www.instagram.com/reel/C5oITxQMOOF/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==


p.s: i know this video is not in english, but just see the animations that pops up. as well as the zoom-ins and zoom-outs. Music, etc.



Budget: $10
Posted On: July 01, 2024 08:39 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Editing, Motion Graphics
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Shorts Job (Ali Abdaal) - Upwork
item.description:
I have a youtube channel called Techpods. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpsCwwG8Kt_GjEW2jhT7kcw

I'd like to find an editor that can turn 10 of my long form videos into 10 YouTube shorts to post. Stylistically, please refer to this long form video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=njvFmlUCn1U&t=138s&ab_channel=TechPods

Please edit in the same style as the above video for the short.

It should be a trailer format that drives the viewers towards main long form content on my YouTube channel.

item.title: Engaging reels, shorts, tiktoks video editing - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a video editor who could help me create visually pleasing short videos for my social media and clients.

Most reels will be made from long-form/podcast recordings. (You won't need to search for the best parts of the long-form recording).

I am trying to create videos in a similar style to these:
https://www.instagram.com/p/C7nIlq5vnNa/
https://www.instagram.com/p/C7-S9xHomS8/

Please send me your portfolio and some examples of your work.

I work with Premiere Pro and After Effects. I am looking for people who use the same applications so that I can jump in and make quick changes if needed.

The budget is just a placeholder. I am looking for the best cost and quality balance. I will be outsourcing some of my client work, and it needs to be profitable. Keep that in mind and please let me know how much it costs to hire you to edit high-quality reels.
I know that the cost depends on the length and quality of the video. You can give me some examples, so I have a better understanding of the price ranges.

Budget: $20
Posted On: July 01, 2024 08:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: Lithuania
click to apply
